word:
I am having a serious time with my eyes, so will not write more. If I have 


                                     -169- 

time, I will write to Brother Faulkhead personally. If I cannot do this, this letter must serve you all. But I speak to you to open the way for Brother Faulkhead to act in a capacity where his talents will best serve the cause of God, in the way to strengthen it most.--Letter 186, 1906. 





Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. June 8, 1989. Entire Letter.
